question: Species can be defined as the group of organisms that
options: Resemble each other and live in the same habitat
Are of common origin and are always found together
Resemble each other and can interbreed freely
Are of common origin but cannot interbreed freely
answer: Resemble each other and can interbreed freely

question: The pulmonary artery carries
options: deoxygenated blood from the right ventricle to the lungs
oxygenated blood from the right ventricle to the lungs
oxygenated blood from the left ventricle to the right auricle
deoxygenated blood from the left ventricle to the right auricle
answer: deoxygenated blood from the right ventricle to the lungs

question: The pulmonary vein carries
options: oxygenated blood from right ventricle to the lungs
oxygenated blood from the lungs to the left auricle
deoxygenated blood from the lungs to the right auricle

answer: oxygenated blood from the lungs to the left auricle

question: Higher organism use a transport system and not diffusion only to distribute nutrients because
options: The ratio of their surface area is small
